snippet.title: Gentei Shooter Jam Trailer
snippet.description:
Gentei Shooter features a system that allows you to get weapons from a triangle selection that certain enemies drop. There are currently a total of four different weapons to choose from, more may be available in the future.

Inspired by the legendary game Cho Ren Sha 68k, please go check it out while you can.

With help from Jesus Pocket Edition. Sprites by Jesus Pocket Edition, music by FawDot and Jesus Pocket Edition, developed by FawDot. 

You can play the game here.
https://fawdot.itch.io/gentei-shooter
